titleStmt.title: A Designe for plentie, by an universall planting of fruit-trees: tendred by some wel-wishers to the publick.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Wodenothe in Leaden-hall street, over against Leaden-hall.,

notesStmt.note: Refers to a treatise of Ralph Austin "which now he is putting to the presse, as by his own letter written in November last 1652 he doth informe me".
Running title reads: A designe for plenty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
